reviewText: Wow hard to believe at one point of this story Sagat and Ryu became friends and teamed up, well i thought the dubbed version of this was fine, if u love animes and are fans of Streetfighter check this out, it rocks
Bad thing is that alot of lines are modified and it doesn't make sense on the english version, but still the dubbed is fairly acceptable. Whatever you do, just get the original subtitle version.
I think that the fight scenes in this anime are very well drawn. Chun-Li is awesome and I love her. If you where to ask me to recommend an anime for you this series would be the one!
If you don't see any of the remaining nine volumes of the Street Fighter V series, make sure you see this one. It is loaded with ACTION!!! Nuff Said! BUY IT!
